Package app

The app package serves as the entry point for the Poker game application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Entry point for the Java Poker application.

Package app Description

The app package serves as the entry point for the Poker game application. It is responsible for initiating the game session and invoking the main game loop.

App:

  • Description: Contains the main method which acts as the starting point of the application. It creates an instance of Game and runs the game with a predefined number of players.
  • Key Public Methods:
    • main(String[] args) - The application entry point that initializes and starts the game.
